value.name: A Transient 7.92s X-ray Pulsar in the SMC (SXP 7.92)
value.snippet: In order for SXP 8.02, which was not inside the Swift FOV, to be the source of the 7.92s pulsations it would have to have exhibited significant spin-up, behavior that is not expected from an AXP. As the XRT FOV is much smaller than that of the PCA, the Swift non-detection of the 7.92s source does not necessarily mean that this source was not active at the time of the Swift observation.
